themes: clarity of ACME's role and limitations
identification of ecosystem needs and gaps
key_phrases: Identify the core needs of the music and arts ecosystem
identify what is feasible financial, and operationally and from a policy perspective
identify the gaps so it is very transparent what ACME's role is and is not
ACME should NOT be providing grants that are the lifeline for the arts/music community
focus heavily on capacity building to stablize the arts and culture ecosystem
grants program is not used as the only operational funding for an entity
barriers_identified: overreliance on grants as sole operational funding
solutions_proposed: identify core needs of the music and arts ecosystem
determine what is feasible financially, operationally, and from a policy perspective
identify gaps and clarify ACME's role
focus on capacity building instead of providing grants as lifeline
